Crouching (CROUCH)
    origin: Shared_pak\Public\Shared\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_BOOST.txt
    type: StatusData
    StatusType: BOOST
    DisplayName: Crouching
    Description: Enemies have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on ranged attacks against a crouching creatures. They have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on melee attacks against it.
    Icon: Action_Hide
    StackId: CROUCH
    Boosts: IF(not DistanceToTargetGreaterThan(3)):Advantage(AttackTarget);IF(DistanceToTargetGreaterThan(3)):Disadvantage(AttackTarget)
    RemoveEvents: OnTurn
    StatusPropertyFlags: DisableOverhead

    DisplayName: Dipped in Fire
    StatusPropertyFlags: DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator

    type: StatusData
    StatusType: BOOST
    DisplayName: Temporarily Hostile
    Description: If you knock out this entity or flee from combat it may harbour some resentment towards you, but will not remain hostile.
    Icon: PassiveFeature_Generic_Info
    StackId: HOSTILE
    StackPriority: 1
    RemoveConditions: not Combat() or Tagged('ALWAYS_PERMANENTLY_HOSTILE_TO_ALL_PLAYERS') or IsInCombatWithHostilePartyMember(true) or not IsInCombatWithHostilePartyMember(false)
    RemoveEvents: OnApply;OnStatusApplied;OnFactionChanged;OnCombatEnded
    StatusPropertyFlags: DisableCombatlog

%%% Empty (PERMANENTLY_HOSTILE)
    origin: Shared_pak\Public\Shared\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_BOOST.txt
    type: StatusData
    StatusType: BOOST
    DisplayName: %%% Empty
    Description: %%% Technical status to override the TEMPORARILY_HOSTILE status when an NPC becomes permanently hostile, and to fall back to TEMPORARILY_HOSTILE in case the permanent hostility (faction relation) gets removed again
    StackId: HOSTILE
    StackPriority: 1
    RemoveConditions: not Combat() or (not Tagged('ALWAYS_PERMANENTLY_HOSTILE_TO_ALL_PLAYERS') and not IsInCombatWithHostilePartyMember(true))
    RemoveEvents: OnCombatEnded;OnFactionChanged;OnStatusApplied;OnApply
    StatusPropertyFlags: DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator
    OnRemoveFunctors: IF(not Tagged('ALWAYS_PERMANENTLY_HOSTILE_TO_ALL_PLAYERS')  and IsInCombatWithHostilePartyMember(false)):ApplyStatus(TEMPORARILY_HOSTILE,100,-1)

            Icon: Spell_Illusion_PhantasmalForce
            StackId: PHANTASMAL_FORCE_DAMAGE
            StackType: Overwrite
            TooltipDamage: DealDamage(1d6,Slashing)
            TickFunctors: DealDamage(1d6,Slashing,Magical)

Rage (RAGE)
    origin: Shared_pak\Public\Shared\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_BOOST.txt
    type: StatusData
    StatusType: BOOST
    DisplayName: Rage
    Description: Deals an additional [1] damage with melee and improvised weapons, and while throwing objects.<br><br>Has Resistance to physical damage, and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. <br><br>Cannot cast or concentrate on spells.
    DescriptionParams: LevelMapValue(RageDamage)
    Icon: Action_Barbarian_Rage
    SoundLoop: Spell_Status_Rage
    SoundStop: Spell_Status_Rage_Stop
    StatusSoundState: 7adcc1d1-6d19-4480-bc2e-0913164285ca
    StackId: RAGE
    StackPriority: 0
    TickType: EndTurn
    Boosts: Tag(VFX_RAGE);UnlockSpell(Shout_EndRage);Attribute(ForceMainhandAlternativeEquipBones);
    Passives: Rage_Rage_Boosts;Rage_Attack;Rage_Damaged;Rage_NoHeavyArmour_VFX
    RemoveConditions: not HasStatus('RAGE_STOP_REMOVE') or not Combat()
    RemoveEvents: OnTurn;OnCombatEnded
    TickFunctors: IF(not Combat(context.Source)):RemoveStatus(SG_Rage)
    StatusPropertyFlags: UnavailableInActiveRoll
    OnApplyFunctors: IF(not HasHeavyArmor(context.Source)):ApplyStatus(RAGE_NO_HEAVY_ARMOUR_VFX,100,10);ApplyStatus(RAGE_STOP_REMOVE,100,1)
    OnRemoveFunctors: RemoveStatus(RAGE_MUTE);RemoveStatus(RAGE_STOP_REMOVE);RemoveStatus(RAGE_NO_HEAVY_ARMOUR_VFX);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.TimeOut) or RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):ApplyStatus(RAGE_ENDED,100,1);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.TimeOut) or RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Shout_EndRage,true,true,true)
    StatusGroups: SG_Rage;SG_RemoveOnRespec
    StatusEffect: 30fd26c7-1a1e-4328-9a9a-38c0f55be597
    TooltipPermanentWarnings: 5b0c1209-0e18-49a0-bec6-df484d977300
    DynamicAnimationTag: b6aa23c3-c96d-42d5-8ffa-8d441d18faa7


%%% Rage Mute (RAGE_MUTE)
    origin: Shared_pak\Public\Shared\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_BOOST.txt
    type: StatusData
    StatusType: BOOST
    DisplayName: %%% Rage Mute
    Description: %%% Technical status; doesn't need to be destubbed.
    Boosts: BlockSpellCast()
    RemoveConditions: not HasStatus('SG_Rage')
    RemoveEvents: OnTurn;OnStatusRemoved
    StatusPropertyFlags: DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator
    OnApplyFunctors: BreakConcentration()

    StatusType: BOOST

Spirit Guardians (SPIRIT_GUARDIANS_RADIANT)
    origin: Shared_pak\Public\Shared\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_BOOST.txt
    type: StatusData
    StatusType: BOOST
    DisplayName: Spirit Guardians
    Description: Spirits assail the affected entity.<br><br>Takes [1] per turn, and <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is halved.<br><br>Still takes half damage on successful Saving Throw.<br><br>Removed upon leaving the area.
    DescriptionParams: DealDamage(3d8,Radiant)
    Icon: Spell_Conjuration_SpiritGuardians
    Boosts: ActionResourceConsumeMultiplier(Movement, 2,0);MovementSpeedLimit(Walk)
    TooltipSave: Wisdom
    TooltipDamage: DealDamage(3d8,Radiant)
    StatusPropertyFlags: TickingWithSource
    OnApplyRoll: not SavingThrow(Ability.Wisdom, SourceSpellDC())
    OnApplySuccess: IF(not HasStatus('SPIRIT_GUARDIANS_DAMAGE_RECEIVED')):DealDamage(3d8,Radiant,Magical);IF(not HasStatus('SPIRIT_GUARDIANS_DAMAGE_RECEIVED')):ApplyStatus(SPIRIT_GUARDIANS_DAMAGE_RECEIVED,100,1)
    OnApplyFail: IF(not HasStatus('SPIRIT_GUARDIANS_DAMAGE_RECEIVED')):DealDamage(3d8/2,Radiant,Magical);IF(not HasStatus('SPIRIT_GUARDIANS_DAMAGE_RECEIVED')):ApplyStatus(SPIRIT_GUARDIANS_DAMAGE_RECEIVED,100,1)
    OnTickRoll: not SavingThrow(Ability.Wisdom, SourceSpellDC())
    OnTickSuccess: IF(not HasStatus('SPIRIT_GUARDIANS_DAMAGE_RECEIVED') or StatusDurationLessThan(context.Source, 'SPIRIT_GUARDIANS_DAMAGE_RECEIVED', 0.1)):DealDamage(3d8,Radiant,Magical);ApplyStatus(SPIRIT_GUARDIANS_DAMAGE_RECEIVED,100,1)
    OnTickFail: IF(not HasStatus('SPIRIT_GUARDIANS_DAMAGE_RECEIVED') or StatusDurationLessThan(context.Source, 'SPIRIT_GUARDIANS_DAMAGE_RECEIVED', 0.1)):DealDamage(3d8/2,Radiant,Magical);ApplyStatus(SPIRIT_GUARDIANS_DAMAGE_RECEIVED,100,1)
    StatusGroups: SG_RemoveOnRespec
    StatusEffect: cbb2672a-9aeb-40ed-a252-f56fd8424965
    StatusEffectOnTurn: 04546e68-7dba-4d99-8366-284b5fcf9cd0

Wyvern Toxin (TOXIN_WYVERN)
    origin: Shared_pak\Public\Shared\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_BOOST.txt
    type: StatusData
    StatusType: BOOST
    using: WEAPON_COATED_WITH_POISON
    DisplayName: Wyvern Toxin
    Description: Deals an additional [1].<br><br>On a successful DC 15 Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, target still takes half damage.
    DescriptionParams: DealDamage(1d8,Poison)
    Icon: Item_GRN_Poison_vial_D_Sheathe
    SoundStart: Misc_Status_WyvernToxin_Start
    StackId: TOXIN_WYVERN

    ApplyEffect: bf82daaa-8ac4-4e63-8fc5-605bc595145c

Blade Barrier (BLADE_BARRIER_AURA)
    origin: Shared_pak\Public\SharedDev\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_BOOST.txt
    type: StatusData
    StatusType: BOOST
    DisplayName: Blade Barrier
    Description: Creatures that approach the barrier are slit and sliced and cut and carved like so much meat on a blood-grouted block. 
    Icon: Spell_Evocation_BladeBarrier
    StackId: BLADE_BARRIER
    StackPriority: 0
    TooltipSave: Dexterity
    TooltipDamage: DealDamage(6d10,Slashing)
    StatusPropertyFlags: InitiateCombat;BringIntoCombat;DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator
    OnApplyRoll: not SavingThrow(Ability.Dexterity, 15)
    OnApplySuccess: IF(not HasStatus('BLADE_BARRIER_DAMAGE_RECEIVED')):DealDamage(6d10,Slashing,Magical);IF(not HasStatus('BLADE_BARRIER_DAMAGE_RECEIVED')):ApplyStatus(BLADE_BARRIER_DAMAGE_RECEIVED,100,1)
    OnApplyFail: IF(not HasStatus('BLADE_BARRIER_DAMAGE_RECEIVED')):DealDamage(6d10/2,Slashing,Magical);IF(not HasStatus('BLADE_BARRIER_DAMAGE_RECEIVED')):ApplyStatus(BLADE_BARRIER_DAMAGE_RECEIVED,100,1)
    OnTickRoll: not SavingThrow(Ability.Dexterity, SourceSpellDC())
    OnTickSuccess: IF(not HasStatus('BLADE_BARRIER_DAMAGE_RECEIVED') or StatusDurationLessThan(context.Source, 'BLADE_BARRIER_DAMAGE_RECEIVED', 0.1)):DealDamage(6d10,Slashing,Magical);ApplyStatus(BLADE_BARRIER_DAMAGE_RECEIVED,100,1)
    OnTickFail: IF(not HasStatus('BLADE_BARRIER_DAMAGE_RECEIVED') or StatusDurationLessThan(context.Source, 'BLADE_BARRIER_DAMAGE_RECEIVED', 0.1)):DealDamage(6d10/2,Slashing,Magical);ApplyStatus(BLADE_BARRIER_DAMAGE_RECEIVED,100,1)

    origin: Shared_pak\Public\SharedDev\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_BOOST.txt
    type: StatusData
    StatusType: BOOST
    DisplayName: Deflect Missiles
    Description: You can use your reaction to deflect the missiles from ranged weapon attacks. When you do so, the damage is reduced by [1] + your Monk class level.
    DescriptionParams: 6+DexterityModifier
    Icon: Action_Monk_DeflectMissile
    StackId: DEFLECT_MISSILES
    Boosts: IF(IsAttackType(AttackType.RangedWeaponAttack)):DamageReduction(All,Flat,1d10+DexterityModifier)
    RemoveConditions: (IsAttackType(AttackType.RangedWeaponAttack) or (SpellTypeIs(SpellType.Throw) and HasWeaponProperty(WeaponProperties.Thrown,context.HitDescription.ThrownObject))) and (HasDamageEffectFlag(DamageFlags.Hit) or HasDamageEffectFlag(DamageFlags.Critical)) and not (IsCriticalMiss() or IsMiss())
    RemoveEvents: OnAttacked
    StatusPropertyFlags: DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog
    OnRemoveFunctors: IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseActionResource(ReactionActionPoint,1) 
    StatusGroups: SG_RemoveOnRespec

    type: StatusData
    StatusType: BOOST
    DisplayName: Entropic Ward

Improved Extra Attack (EXTRA_ATTACK_2)
    origin: Shared_pak\Public\SharedDev\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_BOOST.txt
    type: StatusData
    StatusType: BOOST
    using: EXTRA_ATTACK
    DisplayName: Improved Extra Attack
    Description: You can take an additional two weapon attacks when you take the Attack action.
    StackId: EXTRA_ATTACK
    StackPriority: 40
    TickType: StartTurn
    Boosts: UnlockSpellVariant(ExtraAttackCheck(),ModifyUseCosts(Replace,ActionPoint,0,0,ActionPoint),ModifyIconGlow(),ModifyTooltipDescription())
    OnRemoveFunctors: IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):ApplyStatus(EXTRA_ATTACK, 100, 1)
    X____ROOT ITEM EXTRA_ATTACK STATS____X
        Extra Attack (EXTRA_ATTACK)
            origin: Shared_pak\Public\Shared\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_BOOST.txt
            type: StatusData
            StatusType: BOOST
            DisplayName: Extra Attack
            Description: Make an additional weapon attack this turn.
            Icon: PassiveFeature_ExtraAttack
            StackId: EXTRA_ATTACK
            StackPriority: 20
            TickType: StartTurn
            Boosts: UnlockSpellVariant(ExtraAttackCheck(),ModifyUseCosts(Replace,ActionPoint,0,0,ActionPoint),ModifyIconGlow(),ModifyTooltipDescription())
            RemoveConditions: (HasStringInSpellRoll('WeaponAttack') or HasStringInSpellRoll('UnarmedAttack') or SpellId('Target_CommandersStrike')) and HasUseCosts('ActionPoint',false,context.Target) and not IsOffHandAttack()
            RemoveEvents: OnSpellCast
            StatusPropertyFlags: DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;DisableOverhead;ApplyToDead

    type: StatusData
    StatusType: BOOST
    DisplayName: Deepened Pact: Extra Attack

Seen (SEE_INVISIBILITY_SEEN)
    origin: Shared_pak\Public\SharedDev\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_BOOST.txt
    type: StatusData
    StatusType: BOOST
    DisplayName: Seen
    StackId: SEE_INVISIBILITY_SEEN
    StatusPropertyFlags: DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator
    OnApplyFunctors: IF(Item()):ApplyStatus(SEE_INVISIBILITY_REVEAL)
    OnApplyRoll: Item() or ( (not HasStatus('SEE_INVISIBILITY_SUCCESS') or StatusDurationLessThan(context.Target, 'SEE_INVISIBILITY_SUCCESS', 0.1)) and not SavingThrow(Ability.Dexterity, SourceSpellDC()) )
    OnApplySuccess: ApplyStatus(SEE_INVISIBILITY_REVEAL)
    OnApplyFail: ApplyStatus(SEE_INVISIBILITY_SUCCESS)
    OnTickRoll: Item() or ( (not HasStatus('SEE_INVISIBILITY_SUCCESS') or StatusDurationLessThan(context.Target, 'SEE_INVISIBILITY_SUCCESS', 0.1)) and not SavingThrow(Ability.Dexterity, SourceSpellDC()) )
    OnTickSuccess: ApplyStatus(SEE_INVISIBILITY_REVEAL)
    OnTickFail: ApplyStatus(SEE_INVISIBILITY_SUCCESS)

Wall of Fire: Aura (WALLOFFIRE_AURA)
    origin: Shared_pak\Public\SharedDev\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_BOOST.txt
    type: StatusData
    StatusType: BOOST
    DisplayName: Wall of Fire: Aura
    Description: Engulfed in a wall of blazing flames. The affected entity takes [2] per turn it stays within [1] of the fire.
    DescriptionParams: Distance(3);DealDamage(5d8,Fire)
    Icon: GenericIcon_DamageType_Fire
    StackId: WALLOFFIRE
    StackPriority: 0
    TickType: EndTurn
    TooltipDamage: DealDamage(5d8,Fire)
    StatusPropertyFlags: DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog
    OnApplyRoll: WallOfFireCheck(Ability.Dexterity,SourceSpellDC(10,GetSummoner(context.Source)))
    OnApplySuccess: IF(not HasStatus('WALLOFFIRE_DAMAGE_RECEIVED')):DealDamage(5d8,Fire,Magical);IF(not HasStatus('WALLOFFIRE_DAMAGE_RECEIVED')):ApplyStatus(WALLOFFIRE_DAMAGE_RECEIVED,100,1)
    OnApplyFail: IF(not HasStatus('WALLOFFIRE_DAMAGE_RECEIVED')):DealDamage(5d8/2,Fire,Magical);IF(not HasStatus('WALLOFFIRE_DAMAGE_RECEIVED',context.Target)):ApplyStatus(WALLOFFIRE_DAMAGE_RECEIVED,100,1)
    OnTickRoll: WallOfFireCheck(Ability.Dexterity,SourceSpellDC(10,GetSummoner(context.Source)))
    OnTickSuccess: IF(not HasStatus('WALLOFFIRE_DAMAGE_RECEIVED') or StatusDurationLessThan(context.Source, 'WALLOFFIRE_DAMAGE_RECEIVED', 0.1)):DealDamage(5d8,Fire,Magical);ApplyStatus(WALLOFFIRE_DAMAGE_RECEIVED,100,1)
    OnTickFail: IF(not HasStatus('WALLOFFIRE_DAMAGE_RECEIVED') or StatusDurationLessThan(context.Source, 'WALLOFFIRE_DAMAGE_RECEIVED', 0.1)):DealDamage(5d8/2,Fire,Magical);ApplyStatus(WALLOFFIRE_DAMAGE_RECEIVED,100,1)

    X____ROOT ITEM EXTRA_ATTACK STATS____X
        Extra Attack (EXTRA_ATTACK)
            origin: Shared_pak\Public\Shared\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_BOOST.txt
            type: StatusData
            StatusType: BOOST
            DisplayName: Extra Attack
            Description: Make an additional weapon attack this turn.
            Icon: PassiveFeature_ExtraAttack
            StackId: EXTRA_ATTACK
            StackPriority: 20
            TickType: StartTurn
            Boosts: UnlockSpellVariant(ExtraAttackCheck(),ModifyUseCosts(Replace,ActionPoint,0,0,ActionPoint),ModifyIconGlow(),ModifyTooltipDescription())
            RemoveConditions: (HasStringInSpellRoll('WeaponAttack') or HasStringInSpellRoll('UnarmedAttack') or SpellId('Target_CommandersStrike')) and HasUseCosts('ActionPoint',false,context.Target) and not IsOffHandAttack()
            RemoveEvents: OnSpellCast
            StatusPropertyFlags: DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;DisableOverhead;ApplyToDead

            OnRemoveFunctors: RemoveStatus(SELF,HUNTERS_MARK_OWNER);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Death)):ApplyStatus(SELF,HUNTERS_MARK_REAPPLY,100,-1,,,,,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):ApplyStatus(SELF,HUNTERS_MARK_REAPPLY,100,-1,,,,,true)
            ApplyEffect: 5a259bdd-10d5-453a-9aee-1e85a986baf4

            type: StatusData
            StatusType: BOOST
            using: SPIRIT_GUARDIANS_RADIANT
            DescriptionParams: DealDamage(3d8,Necrotic)
            TooltipDamage: DealDamage(3d8,Necrotic)

            RemoveEvents: OnAttacked
            StatusGroups: SG_Charmed;SG_Condition;SG_Charmed_Subtle
            StatusEffect: a53689ae-d00b-45e1-8dd6-4540635f070e

%%% See description (KNOCKED_OUT)
    origin: Shared_pak\Public\Shared\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_INCAPACITATED.txt
    type: StatusData
    StatusType: INCAPACITATED
    using: KNOCKED_OUT_BASE
    DisplayName: %%% See description
    Description: %%% No description, as it can be either temporary or permanent. These are set by the KNOCKED_OUT_PERMANENTLY/KNOCKED_OUT_TEMPORARILY statuses applied by this one (also the reason why you should inherit from KNOCKED_OUT_INHERITABLE below, so you don't additionally get one of these two statuses).
    StatusPropertyFlags: InitiateCombat;GiveExp;AllowLeaveCombat;ForceNeutralInteractions;DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator
    OnApplyFunctors: BreakConcentration(); RemoveStatus(BLEEDING); RemoveStatus(BURNING); RemoveStatus(CAUSTIC_BRINE); IF(not HasStatus('PERMANENTLY_HOSTILE_MANUAL') and not HasStatus('FORCE_KNOCKED_OUT_PERMANENTLY') and ((Combat() and HasStatus('TEMPORARILY_HOSTILE')) or (not Combat() and not Enemy()))):ApplyStatus(KNOCKED_OUT_TEMPORARILY,100,-1); IF(HasStatus('PERMANENTLY_HOSTILE_MANUAL') or HasStatus('FORCE_KNOCKED_OUT_PERMANENTLY') or ((Combat() and not HasStatus('TEMPORARILY_HOSTILE')) or (not Combat() and Enemy()))):ApplyStatus(KNOCKED_OUT_PERMANENTLY,100,-1);
    X____ROOT ITEM KNOCKED_OUT_BASE STATS____X
        Knocked Out (KNOCKED_OUT_BASE)
            origin: Shared_pak\Public\Shared\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_INCAPACITATED.txt
            type: StatusData
            StatusType: INCAPACITATED
            DisplayName: Knocked Out
            Description: Can't move or take actions, bonus actions, or reactions. <br><br>Will regain consciousness after a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.

            AnimationEnd: 37fe9557-0310-4273-9e28-03c1613e4101(STAT_KO_Peace_01_End)

    origin: Gustav_pak\Public\GustavDev\Stats\Generated\Data\Status_POLYMORPHED.txt
    type: StatusData
    StatusType: POLYMORPHED
    DisplayName: Shadow-Cursed Undead
    Description: Those who die in the shadows are cursed to remain there forever.<br><br>These undead have reduced <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>, are <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Necrotic damage, and cannot use spell or weapon actions.
    Icon: GenericIcon_DamageType_Necrotic
    StillAnimationType: Weakened
    StillAnimationPriority: Weakened
    Boosts: DarkvisionRangeOverride(18);StatusImmunity(HEAL);StatusImmunity(FEARED);StatusImmunity(COMMAND_FLEE);DamageBonus(2d4+2,Necrotic);AC(-5);Ability(Intelligence,-5);Ability(Wisdom,-5);Ability(Charisma,-5);Resistance(Necrotic,Resistant);FactionOverride(db6c0191-8663-7dbd-8706-b99062a7b442);AiArchetypeOverride(zombie,1);ProficiencyBonusOverride(0);Disadvantage(AllSavingThrows);IncreaseMaxHP(-5);UnlockSpellVariant(ShadowCurseUndead(),ModifyUseCosts(Replace,BonusActionPoint,1,0,ActionPoint));UnlockSpellVariant(not ShadowCurseUndead(),ModifyUseCosts(Replace,ActionPoint,1,0,BonusActionPoint));ActionResourceBlock(BonusActionPoint);StatusImmunity(SCL_MOONSHIELD);BlockTravel();Tag(ACT2_SHADOW_CURSE_IMMUNE)
    RemoveConditions: IsKillingBlow()
    StatusPropertyFlags: ForceOverhead;ApplyToDead;LoseControl;IgnoreResting
    RemoveEvents: OnDamage
    OnApplyFunctors: ApplyStatus(SCL_SHADOW_CURSE_UNDEAD,100,-1)
    TemplateID: a42a8493-b701-4d71-bdc8-0857e718c247
    Rules: 3cda987f-5e0f-44e0-b54d-c72020040406
    StatusEffect: a9cf5cbf-4247-4b9a-b81b-e3af4982ff62
